product.title: Dragonfly Tropical Sunset - Roller Blind
product.description: Tropical sunset is a blend of colours that allows you to lose yourself in the moment and celebrate the free artistic expression that brings the design to life. The calming blues and passionate pinks evoke memories of time spent outside in the sun -just what you need to brighten any day. If you want to add a statement piece to the dining room there's no better way to do it than choosing your favourite colour from tropical sunset.

relproducts.description: Give your room a pick-me-up with the bright and breezy indonesia tropical roman blind. Flaunting a floral motif in zesty, invigorating tones, this fully lined cotton blind exudes a distinctly fresh and tropical vibe. When raised via the sidewinder chain, this blind folds up into neat pleats and is a stylish and space saving window covering that is elegant in its simplicity. relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.
